void org.ccnx.ccn.utils.explorer.ContentExplorer.MouseActions.mousePressed ( MouseEvent  e  ) 

Class to handle mouse events.

This includes a single click to begin enumeration for folders. If the selected item is a .txt or .text file, it will preview in the lower pane.

Parameters:
e MouseEvent
